attributes.action: Change The Legislation Against Certain Dog Breeds In The UK.
attributes.background: This law is an outrage, a dogs actions are influenced by an owner. We do not discriminate against humans by banning certain races, so why can be do this with dogs by breed? I personally have had a Staffordshire Bull Terrier, Pitbull cross. He was perfect, My best friend. Stand Up and Fight This Law!
